roleset.name: to try to do something
roleset.note: ENDEAVOR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'endeavor' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from endeavor.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: endeavor-v: transitive
example.text: At that point , he said [0] [*T*-1], Qintex Australia stated [0] it would `` endeavor [*-2] to arrange '' the financing .

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: For the PRC , which is endeavoring to move from coastal defense to a blue - water capability , the provocation would be enormous .
example.arg: to move from coastal defense to a blue - water capability
